main event: An oval light with a greenish tinge was sighted in McComb, Ohio on August 24, 1960, at high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and large,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,It was observed at 11:30 PM,The object was reported to have taken a course of 185 degrees,The observation was concluded to be typical of a meteor.
sighted object: an oval light with a greenish tinge
witness description: Middle-aged male resident of McComb, Ohio
